item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Patrick Browne, and I’m a student from northern MA. This is my personal website, meant to be a reference for the projects that I have worked on in the past and those that I’m working on today. Right now, I am studying computer science at Boston University. Previously, I worked at a startup called ProPhone (now Topline Pro (YC W21)), where I helped service professionals to grow their businesses online.

item.title: Projects
item.description: What I’m working on Link to heading These are some of the projects I’m currently working on Modeling the VIX Link to heading Spring 2023 Repository A project in Python to model the Volatility Index (VIX) using the GARCH and ARIMA models, as well as neural nets. Cubert Link to heading February 2023 Repository This is a project to implement different algorithms to solve a Rubik’s cube, each with a different definition of “efficiency”.
